pages.text:
About Us
Get to know the story behind Prohibition Pizza – from our passion for authentic flavors to our journey in bringing artisan pizza to the heart of High Springs.
Where Pizza Meets Passion
At Prohibition Pizza, we’re more than just a pizza place – we’re a family-driven dream brought to life in the heart of High Springs.
Owners Kelly and David Potter combined their passion for cooking with a commitment to quality, crafting authentic New York-style pizzas with handmade dough and fresh, natural ingredients. From our unique artisan pizzas to oven-baked wings, salads, and desserts, we’re dedicated to serving delicious food in a welcoming, community-focused atmosphere. Located across from High Springs Brewing Company, we’re proud to be voted Best Pizza in Florida 2024 and Best Lunch 2024!
With a focus on authenticity and creativity, Prohibition Pizza has become a beloved gathering place for locals and visitors alike. Whether you’re stopping in for a casual lunch, a family dinner, or a night out with friends, our menu offers something for everyone. From our classic recipes to innovative topping combinations, each dish reflects our dedication to excellence and flavor.
As a family-owned business, we take pride in our roots and our relationships within the High Springs community. Beyond serving great food, we’re passionate about creating a space where people can connect, celebrate, and make lasting memories. At Prohibition Pizza, every slice tells a story, and we’re excited to share it with you.
At Prohibition Pizza, we’re more than just pizza – we’re a place where community, creativity, and unforgettable flavors come together.

Contact Us
We’re excited to connect with you! Whether you have a question about our menu, need assistance with your visit, or just want to share your love for pizza, we’re here to help. Reach out to us today!

Our Location
Find us in the heart of High Springs, just a block off Main Street and across from High Springs Brewing Company. Stop by for a slice of artisan pizza and a warm, welcoming atmosphere!

High Springs, FL
